about.summary:
LFTP is a sophisticated file transfer program supporting a number of network protocols
(ftp, http, sftp, fish, torrent). Like BASH, it has job control and uses the readline
library for input. It has bookmarks, a built-in mirror command, and can transfer
several files in parallel. It was designed with reliability in mind.

name: lftp
raw_recipe:
{% set name = "lftp" %}
{% set version = "4.7.7" %}
{% set sha256 = "7bce216050094a1146ed05bed8fe5b3518224764ffe98884a848d44dc76fff8f" %}
{% set am_version = "1.15" %}
{% set native = 'm2w64-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: {{ name }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  fn: {{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  url: http://lftp.yar.ru/ftp/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: {{ sha256 }}

build:
  number: 0
  # Windows build fails due to missing [n]curses.h or terminfo.h
  skip: True                       # [win]

requirements:
  build:
    - posix                        # [win]
    - python                       # [win]
    - m2-bison                     # [win]
    - m2-autoconf                  # [win]
    - m2-automake{{ am_version }}  # [win]
    - m2-libtool                   # [win]
    - {{native}}pkg-config
    - {{native}}toolchain
    - {{native}}libiconv
    - {{native}}gettext
    - {{native}}xz 5.2.*
    - readline 6.2*                # [not win]
    - ncurses 5.9*                 # [not win]
    - {{native}}openssl
    - expat
    - zlib 1.2.*
    - m2-libreadline               # [win]
    - m2-ncurses                   # [win]

  run:
    - {{native}}openssl
    - expat
    - zlib 1.2.*
    - {{native}}libiconv
    - {{native}}gettext
    - readline 6.2*                # [not win]
    - ncurses 5.9*                 # [not win]
    - m2-libreadline               # [win]
    - m2-ncurses                   # [win]

test:
  commands:
    - conda inspect linkages -p $PREFIX $PKG_NAME   # [not win]
    - conda inspect objects -p $PREFIX $PKG_NAME    # [osx]
    - lftp --version

about:
  home: https://lftp.yar.ru/
  license: GPL_v3
  license_family: GPL
  license_file: COPYING
  summary: |
    LFTP is a sophisticated file transfer program supporting a number of network protocols
    (ftp, http, sftp, fish, torrent). Like BASH, it has job control and uses the readline
    library for input. It has bookmarks, a built-in mirror command, and can transfer
    several files in parallel. It was designed with reliability in mind.

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - epruesse
